info.name: Congress Central API
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?
    - Allows access to database with congress members, comittees and legislation.

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about
    - API returns JSON.

# Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?
    - All requests should be fufilled with code 200.

item.name: Get all member names and ID

exec: pm.test("Get all member names and ID", function(){

response.name: Getting all members and their ID

item.name: Get all information about a member ID

exec: pm.test("Response time is less than 500ms", function () {

request.description: Use a specific member ID and get all relevant information.

response.name: Get all information about a member ID
